reasoning: Vascular EDS (Type IV) incidence estimated at 1 in 250,000 births (~0.4 per 100k). Well-defined genetic subtype with characteristic vascular fragility. Data from rare disease registries and genetic databases.
source: Malfait F et al. (2017). The 2017 international classification of the Ehlers-Danlos syndromes. Am J Med Genet C. 175(1):8-26
